name: Shake It 'Till You Make It!
description:
"Shake It 'Till You Make It!" Is a puzzle/rhythm game inspired by those heavily crowded dancefloors seen at weddings and quinceaños. Enjoy some groovy cumbias while you dance your way to your partner, but beware!  She might not be in the mood to dance unless you do something about it.

Controls:

Use Arrow Keys to move and the prompted keybinds for in-menu navigation.

Made for LudumDare 42 in less than 72 hours. Any feedback is deeply appreciated!

Note: We've never done builds for mac before, so if you're a mac user and encounter a problem trying to run the game, feel free to leave a comment or write to us at gusastudiosmx@gmail.com
